node.name: SMTP Enumeration
node.rich_text:
The following is done on the lab:
This lab is for checking the version of the smtp and for finding the valid users.
Used auxiliary/scanner/smtp/smtp_version module to find the version.
Using auxiliary/scanner/smtp/smtp_enum module to enumerate valid users. ( wordlists = /usr/share/metasploit-framework/data/wordlists/unix_users.txt)
